mean_cn: n.信赖，依靠；信赖的人或物
mean_en: the state of needing somebody/something in order to survive, be successful, etc.; the fact of being able to rely on somebody/something
sentence: Babies have a significant reliance on their parents.
sentence_trans: 婴儿十分依赖他们的父母。
word_etyma: reli=rely依靠 ＋ ance性质，状况 → reliance信赖
